information.overview: For the past 75 years, Sennheiser has put sound first. The new MOMENTUM True Wireless 2 is no different. Thanks to leading audio technology and innovation, these new earbuds deliver the best listening experience anytime, anywhere. With improved ergonomics designed for full day wearing and refined touch controls for a more personalised experience, they have been finely crafted for the most discerning listener and aim to simplify your life by enhancing your everyday.
